Title: Planetarium Kamiusagi Rope: Orera Rocket Tobasu tte Maji ssuka!?
Description: ['A planetarium show with the ', Kamiusagi Rope, ' cast. Rope is playing with a PET bottle rocket when it flies off after a failed launch. He and Akira go look for it in the bush when they discover a mysterious alien child. They decide to help the lost alien child return home.']
